title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\Activity
name: Activity
description:
Resource that represents an individual or collaborative activity participated in by a candidate, for example, an open-source project, a class assignment, and so on.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Activity

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: Activity display name. Number of characters allowed is 100.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Activity description. Number of characters allowed is 100,000.

params.name: data.uri
params.description: Activity URI. Number of characters allowed is 4,000.

params.name: data.create_date
params.description: The first creation date of the activity.

params.name: data.update_date
params.description: The last update date of the activity.

params.name: data.team_members
params.description: A list of team members involved in this activity. Number of characters allowed is 100. The limitation for max number of team members is 50.

params.name: data.skills_used
params.description: A list of skills used in this activity. The limitation for max number of skills used is 50.

params.name: data.activity_name_snippet
params.description: Output only. Activity name snippet shows how the [display_name][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Activity.display_name] is related to a search query. It's empty if the [display_name][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Activity.display_name] isn't related to the search query.

params.name: data.activity_description_snippet
params.description: Output only. Activity description snippet shows how the [description][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Activity.description] is related to a search query. It's empty if the [description][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Activity.description] isn't related to the search query.

params.name: data.skills_used_snippet
params.description: Output only. Skill used snippet shows how the corresponding [skills_used][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Activity.skills_used] are related to a search query. It's empty if the corresponding [skills_used][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Activity.skills_used] are not related to the search query.
